vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.2.21;
daughter of: Jethro (H3503);
sister of: Eliasaph (H0460) and Hobab (H2246); married to Moses (H4872);
mother of: Gershom (H1647) and Eliezer (H0461H)
§ Zipporah = "bird"
daughter of Reuel or Jethro, wife of Moses, and mother of Gershom and Eliezer
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西坡拉 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "鳥兒"
流珥(或葉忒羅)的女兒, 摩西的妻子, 革舜和以利以謝的母親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西坡拉 这个阴性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "鸟儿"
流珥(或叶忒罗)的女儿, 摩西的妻子, 革舜和以利以谢的母亲
